column4: 19 December 2019 A foreigner named PATRICK JEAN BAPTISTE DALLARI
column6: came to the office of the Phnom Penh Municipal Police Office to apply for a lost passport.------Came into Cambodia on November 20
column8: entering the country without a passport. He confessed and it was found out he had ------committed robberies and murder in France ------and has been in prison for 20 years.------He was sent for processing and further action.------*It is not clear whether hie is still wanted for any crimes
